ModMetaData.name: Remove Industrial Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
- Options to remove industrial items, research, factions and pawnkinds - Based heavily on the mod Lord of the Rims - The Third Age
